content.rendered:
School Hours:  M,T,T,F: 7:49 a.m. – 2:20 p.m. | W: 7:49 a.m. – 2:05 p.m.

The designation of days is now ABCD.  View the 2024-2025 ABCD calendar.

Bell Schedule

Monday / Tuesday / Thursday / Friday Bell Schedule

View the MTRF Schedule PDF

Block 1 – 7:49 -9:04 a.m.

  • Period: 1.1: 7:49 a.m. 8:25 a.m.
  • Period: 1.2: 8:28-9:04 a.m.

Block 2 – 9:12-10:27 a.m.

  • Period: 2.1: 9:12-9:48 a.m.
  • Period: 2.2: 9:51-10:27 a.m.

Academic Support Flex – (10:35 – 11 a.m.)

Block 3 – 11:08-12:57 p.m. (lunch determined by teacher)

Lunch 1:

  • Lunch: 11:08-11:35 a.m.
  • Class: 11:40 a.m. -12:57 p.m.

Lunch 2

  • Class:  11:08 – 11:33 a.m.
  • Lunch:  11:35 a.m.-12:02 p.m.
  • Class:  12:05-12:57 p.m.

Lunch 3

  • Class: 11:08 a.m.-12:00 p.m.
  • Lunch: 12:02-12:29 p.m.
  • Class: 12:32-12:57 p.m.

Lunch 4

  • Class 3.1: 11:08-11:44 a.m.
  • 3.2: 11:49-12:25 p.m.
  • Lunch: 12:29-12:57 p.m.

Block 4 (1:05-2:20 p.m.)

Period: 4.1: 1:05-1:41 p.m.
Period: 4.2:  1:44-2:20  p.m.

Wednesday Bell Schedule

View the Wednesday Schedule PDF

Block 1 – 7:49 -9:08 a.m.

  • Period: 1.1: 7:49 a.m. 8:27 a.m.
  • Period: 1.2: 8:30-9:08 a.m.

Block 2 – 9:12-10:35 a.m.

  • Period: 2.1: 9:16-9:54 a.m.
  • Period: 2.2: 9:57-10:35 a.m.

Block 3 – 10:43-12:38 p.m. (lunch determined by teacher)

Lunch 1:

  • Lunch: 10:43-11:11 a.m.
  • Class: 11:15 a.m.-12:38 p.m.

Lunch 2

  • Class:  10:43-11:11 a.m.
  • Lunch:  11:02 a.m.-11:40 a.m.
  • Class:  11:43 a.m.-12:38 p.m.

Lunch 3

  • Class: 10:43-11:40 a.m.
  • Lunch: 11:41-12:09 p.m.
  • Class: 12:12 -12:38 p.m.

Lunch 4

  • Class 3.1: 10:43-11:22 a.m.
  • 3.2: 11:27 a.m. – 12:06 p.m.
  • Lunch: 12:10 – 12:38 p.m.

Block 4 – 12:46-2:05 p.m.

Period: 4.1: 12:46-1:24 p.m.
Period: 4.2:  1:27-2:05 p.m.
